text: Domenik Schierl (born July 20, 1994) is an Austrian footballer. He plays as goalkeeper for the Austrian Second League SC Austria Lustenau. ==Career == Domenik Schierl started at TSV St. Johann. He moved to the FC Red Bull Salzburg academy in December 2007. There he went through all levels. In 2011 he became second goalkeeper behind Thomas DÃ¤hne at the Red Bull Juniors and then at FC Liefering. On August 16, 2013, he made his debut in goal for FC Liefering in a 3-0 home win against SV Horn. For the 2014/15 season he moved to SC Wiener Neustadt in the Bundesliga. With Neustadt he was relegated from the Bundesliga in 2015. After four years in the second highest division, they had to leave it in 2019 due to forced relegation. He then moved to the second division team SC Austria Lustenau for the 2019/20 season. In the 2021/22 season the club reached promotion back to the Bundesliga after 22 years in the second division. He stayed with them also after relegation in the 2023-24 season. ==References == Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:FC Liefering players Category:Austrian football goalkeepers Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Domenik Schierl
